front.title: GIN with Literal AoRs for SIP in SSPs (GLASS)

abstract.t: The Martini Working Group is defining a mechanism for SIP IP-PBX type devices to REGISTER and obtain SIP service for E.164-based Address of Records. This document defines a means for other, non- E.164 AoRs of the Registered-to SSP's domain to be used with Martini-based IP-PBXs.
